trans-unit.source: The type of data associated with each filter in the table.
trans-unit.target: 與資料表中每個篩選條件相關聯之資料的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="interface" /> that defines the contract that a filter table must implement to inspect messages with query criteria derived from one or more filters.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="interface" />，它會定義篩選資料表必須實作的合約，以便透過衍生自一或多個篩選條件的查詢準則來檢查訊息。

trans-unit.source: The filter table is a core component of the filter engine.
trans-unit.target: 篩選資料表是篩選引擎的核心元件。

trans-unit.source: The primary use of the filter engine in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] is to match application logic to messages by finding all the filters that match a message.
trans-unit.target: 篩選引擎在 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 中的主要用途，就是藉由尋找所有符合某個訊息的篩選條件來比對應用程式邏輯與訊息。

trans-unit.source: A filter table allows multiple filters to be matched against a single message more efficiently than they can be matched separately.
trans-unit.target: 比起逐一比對每個篩選條件和單一訊息，篩選資料表可更有效率地比對多重篩選條件和單一訊息。

trans-unit.source: A filter table associates filter data with filters.
trans-unit.target: 篩選資料表會使篩選資料與篩選條件產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: The table is a collection of key-value pairs, where the key is the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter>, and the value is the associated filter data.
trans-unit.target: 資料表是索引鍵值組的集合，其中索引鍵為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter>，而值為相關聯的篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: Filter data can be any data of the type specified in the generic parameter and can be used to specify what actions to take if a message is matched by a filter in the table.
trans-unit.target: 篩選資料可以是指定於泛型參數中之型別的任何資料，而且可以用來指定訊息與資料表中的篩選條件相符時所要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: Filter table entries can be accessed using the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> functionality that <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> inherits.
trans-unit.target: 篩選資料表項目可透過 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> 所繼承的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> 功能來加以存取。

trans-unit.source: Note that a filter instance can only be added to a given <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> once.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只能將篩選條件執行個體加入至指定的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601> 一次。

trans-unit.source: To add multiple instances of this filter to the same filter table, use a filter constructor to create additional instances.
trans-unit.target: 若要將此篩選條件的多個執行個體加入至同一個篩選資料表，請使用篩選條件建構函式 (Constructor) 來建立額外的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A filter matches a message when the message satisfies the query criteria of the filter.
trans-unit.target: 當訊息符合篩選條件的查詢準則時，即表示篩選條件與訊息相符。

trans-unit.source: There are four overloaded matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 有四種多載的比對方法。

trans-unit.source: The data returned is either the filter data or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> objects themselves.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的資料不是篩選資料就是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 物件本身。

trans-unit.source: This data is returned whether multiple matches are allowed or only a single match.
trans-unit.target: 不論是允許多個符合項目或是只能有一個符合項目，都會傳回這個資料。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows this information for each overload.
trans-unit.target: 下表會針對每個多載顯示這份資訊。

trans-unit.source: Method Name
trans-unit.target: 方法名稱

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 符合項目

trans-unit.source: Data Returned
trans-unit.target: 傳回的資料

trans-unit.source: Single
trans-unit.target: Single

trans-unit.source: Single
trans-unit.target: Single

trans-unit.source: Multiple
trans-unit.target: 選擇性顯示

trans-unit.source: Multiple
trans-unit.target: 選擇性顯示

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> objects
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 物件

trans-unit.source: Each method contains two overloads.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法都包含有兩個多載。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two overloads is that one takes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> parameter and is not permitted to examine the contents of the body; the other takes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> parameter and can examine any part of the message.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個多載之間的差異，在於一個多載會接受 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 參數但是不允許檢查本文的內容，另外一個多載會接受 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> 參數並且可以檢查訊息的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: If you call a method with the message parameter, and the filter table contains a filter that examines the content of the message body, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以訊息參數呼叫方法，而且篩選資料表包含了檢查訊息本文內容的篩選條件，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you are unsure about the filters in a table, call the overload that takes a message buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不確定資料表中的篩選條件，請呼叫可接受訊息緩衝區的多載。

trans-unit.source: Message headers are automatically buffered and can be inspected by a filter without being consumed.
trans-unit.target: 訊息標頭會自動獲得緩衝，並且可以由篩選條件進行檢查，而不被取用。

trans-unit.source: But if the body is to be inspected by a filter, then the entire message must be buffered because an unbuffered message body is consumed by a query and its contents destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 但若本文要由篩選條件檢查，整份訊息就必須加以緩衝，因為未緩衝的訊息本文將被查詢取用，因而導致其內容損毀。

trans-unit.source: The following classes implement <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601>:
trans-unit.target: 下列類別會實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601>：

trans-unit.source: Filter tables are thread-safe with respect to matching operations, but are not thread-safe with respect to modification.
trans-unit.target: 對於比對作業，篩選資料表是安全執行緒 (Thread-Safe)，但對修改作業而言則不是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Threads that access a filter table should be synchronized by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock" /> or similar locking semantic.
trans-unit.target: 存取篩選資料表的執行緒必須由 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock" /> 或相似的鎖定語意同步處理。

trans-unit.source: This lock allows multiple reads of a filter table (for example, a match operation) to run simultaneously, but in order to write to a filter table (for example, adding a filter), a thread must wait for an exclusive lock.
trans-unit.target: 這種鎖定允許多次讀取篩選資料表來進行同步執行 (例如，進行比對作業時)，但是如果要寫入篩選資料表 (例如，加入篩選條件)，執行緒就必須等候獨佔鎖定。

trans-unit.source: All compilation is done when filters are added to the table.
trans-unit.target: 所有的編譯都會在篩選條件加入至資料表時完成。

trans-unit.source: If you create a filter table in advance, and never edit it, locking is not necessary during a match.
trans-unit.target: 如果您預先建立了篩選資料表，但從未編輯它，在進行比對時就不需要鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filter from the table whose query criteria are satisfied by a specified message or buffered message.
trans-unit.target: 從資料表傳回篩選條件，有某個指定訊息或緩衝訊息符合此篩選條件的查詢準則。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when a single filter is expected to match the message and the matching filter is required.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有單一篩選條件要比對該訊息，而且需要相符的篩選條件時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> if the body content does not require examination.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要檢查本文內容，便可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> if the contents of the message body may require examination.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能需要檢查訊息本文的內容，便可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If more than one filter matches the message, a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" /> must be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，這時一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message, and returns that filter in an <see langword="out" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會表示指定的訊息是否剛好只符合資料表中單一篩選條件的比對準則，並且傳回 <see langword="out" /> 參數中的該篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="message" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <paramref name="message" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when a single filter is expected to match the message and the matching filter is required.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有單一篩選條件要比對該訊息，而且需要相符的篩選條件時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If the body of the message must be inspected by a filter in the filter table, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> version of the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果必須使用篩選資料表中的篩選條件檢查訊息本文，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> 版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: If more than one filter matches the message, a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" /> must be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，這時一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" />。

trans-unit.source: This version takes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> and must throw an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> if it tries to examine the message body.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本會接受 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />，而如果它嘗試檢查訊息本文，就一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message or buffered message, and returns that filter in an <see langword="out" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的訊息或是緩衝的訊息是否只符合資料表中單一篩選條件的比對準則，並且傳回在 <see langword="out" /> 參數中的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="messageBuffer" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <paramref name="messageBuffer" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when a single filter is expected to match the buffered message, the matching filter must be returned, and the body of the message may have to be inspected.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有單一篩選條件與緩衝的訊息相符，必須傳回相符的篩選條件，以及訊息本文可能必須進行檢查時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the filters whose query criteria are satisfied by a specified message or buffered message to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定訊息或緩衝訊息符合之查詢準則所屬的篩選條件新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: Use one of these methods when more than one filter is expected to match the message and the matching filters are required.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，而且必須取得相符的篩選條件時，便可使用下列其中一個方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the collection that contains the filters is not cleared before the results are added.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，包含這些篩選條件的集合在結果加入之前不會進行清除。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to accumulate all matches across multiple filter tables into a single collection.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可讓您將多個篩選資料表中的所有符合項目累積成為單一集合。

trans-unit.source: If the body of the message must be inspected by a filter in the filter table, buffer the message and pass it to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息本文必須由篩選資料表中的篩選條件進行檢查，請緩衝該訊息並將它傳遞至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilters%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilters%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilters%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> objects are stored in the `results` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相符的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 物件會儲存在 `results` 參數中。

trans-unit.source: The filter data can then be recovered from the filter table using these filters as keys with the methods provided by <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以使用這些篩選條件當做索引鍵，並透過 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> 提供的方法，從篩選資料表中重新取得篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Reference parameter that stores the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> objects that match in <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><Filter>.
trans-unit.target: 參考參數，其中儲存 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><Filter> 中相符的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of a filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message, and adds the matching filters to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的訊息或是緩衝的訊息是否符合資料表中之篩選條件的比對準則，並且將相符的篩選條件新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="message" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <paramref name="message" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when more than one filter is expected to match the message, the matching filters are required, and the body of the message does not have to be inspected.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，必須使用相符的篩選條件，以及訊息本文不需要進行檢查時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This version takes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> and must throw an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> if it tries to examine the message body.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本會接受 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />，而如果它嘗試檢查訊息本文，就一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: Reference parameter that stores the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> objects that match in <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><Filter>.
trans-unit.target: 參考參數，其中儲存 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><Filter> 中相符的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of a filter in the table is satisfied by the specified buffered message, and adds the matching filters to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出緩衝的訊息是否符合資料表中之篩選條件的比對準則，並且將相符的篩選條件新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="messageBuffer" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <paramref name="messageBuffer" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when more than one filter is expected to match the buffered message, the matching filter is required, and the body of the message may have to be inspected.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有一個以上的篩選條件與緩衝的訊息相符，必須使用相符的篩選條件，以及訊息本文可能需要進行檢查時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of a filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message or buffered message, and returns the filter data for the filter that matched.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的訊息或是緩衝的訊息是否符合資料表中篩選條件的比對準則，並且傳回相符篩選條件的篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: Use one of these methods when, at most, one filter is expected to match the message and only the filter data from the matching filter must be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 當預期最多只有一個篩選條件與訊息相符，而且只有篩選資料必須從相符篩選條件重新取得時，便可使用下列其中一個方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods return a boolean that indicates whether a matching filter was found and set the `data` reference parameter to the matching filter data.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會傳回布林值 (Boolean)，由這個值指出是否已找到相符的篩選條件，並且將 `data` 參考參數設定為該相符的篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> if the body of the message is not inspected by any of the filters in the filter table.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息本文不用由篩選資料表中的任何一個篩選條件進行檢查，便可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the body of the message may be inspected by a filter in the filter table, buffer the message and pass it to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> version of the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息本文可能會由篩選資料表中的篩選條件進行檢查，請緩衝該訊息並將它傳遞至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingFilter%2A> 版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: If more than one filter matches the message, a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" /> must be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，這時一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message, and adds the matching filter data to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的訊息是否只符合資料表中之一個篩選條件的比對準則，並且將相符的篩選資料新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the message; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息剛好只符合資料表中單一篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when a single filter is expected to match the message and only the filter data from the matching filter must be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有單一篩選條件與訊息相符，而且只有篩選資料才必須從相符的篩選條件重新取得時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method expects at most a single matching filter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法預期最多只有一個相符的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: If more than one filter matches, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException> must be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，這時一定會擲回 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException>。

trans-unit.source: If the body of the message must be inspected by a filter in the filter table, buffer the message using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.CreateBufferedCopy%2A> and pass it to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValue%2A> version of the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息本文必須由篩選資料表中的篩選條件進行檢查，請以 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.CreateBufferedCopy%2A> 來緩衝處理該訊息，並將它傳遞至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValue%2A> 版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: If more than one filter matches the message, a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" /> must be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，這時一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" />。

trans-unit.source: This overload takes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> and must throw an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> if it tries to examine the message body.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會接受 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />，而如果它嘗試檢查訊息本文，就一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified buffered message, and adds the matching filter data to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的緩衝訊息是否只符合資料表中單一篩選條件的比對準則，並且將相符的篩選資料新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of exactly one filter in the table is satisfied by the message; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息剛好只符合資料表中單一篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when a single filter is expected to match the buffered message, only the filter data from the matching filter must be recovered, and the body of the message may have to be inspected.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有單一篩選條件與緩衝的訊息相符，只有篩選資料才必須從相符的篩選條件重新取得，以及訊息本文可能必須進行檢查時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If more than one filter matches the message, a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" /> must be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，這時一定會擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MultipleFilterMatchesException" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the filter data of the filters that match the specified message or buffered message to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 將符合指定訊息或緩衝訊息之篩選條件的篩選資料加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when more than one filter is expected to match and only the matching filter data is required.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有一個以上的篩選條件相符，而且只需要取得相符的篩選資料時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods return a boolean that indicates whether matching filters were found and put any matching filter data into a collection.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會傳回布林值，由這個值指出是否已找到相符的篩選條件，並且將任何相符的篩選資料加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Note that the collection that contains the filter data is not cleared before the results are added.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，包含篩選資料的集合在結果加入之前不會進行清除。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to accumulate all matches across multiple filter tables into a single collection.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可讓您將多個篩選資料表中的所有符合項目累積成為單一集合。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A> if the contents of the message body do not require examination.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要檢查訊息本文的內容，便可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A> if the contents of the message body requires examination.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要檢查訊息本文的內容，便可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Reference parameter that stores the filter data of the matching filters in a generic collection.
trans-unit.target: 參考參數，它會將相符篩選條件的篩選資料儲存到泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified message, and adds the <paramref name="FilterData" /> of the matching filters to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的訊息是否符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，並且將相符篩選條件的 <paramref name="FilterData" /> 加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="message" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <paramref name="message" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when one or more filters are expected to match the message, only the filter data is required, and the contents of the body of the message are not to be inspected.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有一個以上的篩選條件與訊息相符，只需要取得篩選資料，以及訊息本文內容不需要進行檢查時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The filter data of the matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> objects is stored in the `results` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相符 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 物件的篩選資料會儲存在 `results` 參數中。

trans-unit.source: If the body of the message is inspected by a filter in the filter table, buffer the message and pass it to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A> version of the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息本文會由篩選資料表中的篩選條件進行檢查，請緩衝該訊息並將它傳遞至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IMessageFilterTable%601.GetMatchingValues%2A> 版本的方法。

trans-unit.source: Reference parameter that stores the filter data of the matching filters in a generic <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><<c>FilterData</c>>.
trans-unit.target: 參考參數，將相符篩選條件的篩選資料儲存在泛型的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /><<c>FilterData</c>> 中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by the specified buffered message, and adds the <paramref name="FilterData" /> of the matching filters to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會指出指定的緩衝訊息是否符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，並且將相符篩選條件的 <paramref name="FilterData" /> 加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the match criterion of at least one filter in the table is satisfied by <paramref name="messageBuffer" />; <see langword="false" /> if no filter is satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 符合資料表中至少一個篩選條件的比對準則，則為 <paramref name="messageBuffer" />，如果沒有符合任何篩選條件，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when one or more filters are expected to match the buffered message, only the filter data is required, and the body of the message may require inspection.
trans-unit.target: 當預期有一個以上的篩選條件與緩衝訊息相符，只需要取得篩選資料，以及訊息本文不需要進行檢查時，便可使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The filter data of the matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> objects is stored in the `results` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相符 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter> 物件的篩選資料會儲存在 `results` 參數中。
